extraList.productName: 光大永明附加关爱永逸重大疾病保险（2018版）
光大永明附加个人意外伤害医疗保险
光大永明附加定期寿险
光大永明附加住院医疗保险(A款)
光大永明无忧住院医疗保险
光大永明无忧住院津贴医疗保险
光大永明附加少儿重大疾病保险
光大永明附加投保人豁免保险费重大疾病保险

additional.#text:
VAR product = PLAN.PRODUCTS
VAR zhuP = 0.0
VAR fuP = 0.0
VAR sum = 0.0
VAR Zpay = ''
VAR Fpay = ''
VAR num = 0.0
FOR (VAR i = 0.0; i < size(product); i++)
{
    VAR p = product[i]
    IF (p.MAIN == 'yes')
    {
        zhuP = zhuP + p.PREMIUM
        Zpay = p.PAY_CODE
    }
    IF (p.DEF_ID <> 'HDT024' AND p.MAIN == 'no' AND p.QXFL == 'changqi')
    {
        num++
        Fpay = p.PAY_CODE
        IF (Zpay == Fpay OR Fpay == 'parent')
        {
            fuP = fuP + p.PREMIUM
        }
    }
    sum = zhuP + fuP
}
RETURN sum
